name: BasicShmup.p8
description:
Space shootey thingy ! Controls : arrows to move left, right and up, c to shoot.  This is the first video game I made, fully on my own. Its not particularly sophisticated but hey, everyone has to start somewhere, right ?

The original idea for this was to have a spaceship that could accelerate on a background of stars. Then it worked so I kept adding small things and eventually called it finished !
